title: Kidnapped for the Tycoon's Baby
description: “This baby is mine, too, Nola. I’m not letting you out of my sight.”When Nola Mason gives in to an explosive fling with her arrogant boss, Ramsay Walker, she believes she’ll never see him again. Let alone that her stormy affair will have nine-month consequences! Knowing the pain of a chaotic childhood, Nola is determined to raise her child alone…When he discovers the truth, Ram has other ideas! There’s only one way to ensure Nola sees sense— steal her away to his rain forest hideaway, and with the sultry heat fueling their incendiary passion, entice her to marry him!
author: Louise Fuller
